articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Acrobatic Performance Given by Pyongyang Circus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Acrobatic Performance Given by Pyongyang Circus
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an acrobatic performance given by the Pyongyang Circus.
					 Put on the stage were such excellent acrobatic numbers high in artistry as pieces which received gold medals at international acrobatic festivals including physical acrobatic "Multilateral flying",   synchronized swimming "Group acrobatics"", comedic acrobatics "Two fellows" and animal circus "Bears' rope jumping".
					
					  He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the Pyongyang Circus staged a splendid performance reflecting the desire, hope and steadfast revolutionary spirit of the Korean people making steady leap forward and advances by fully embodying the WPK's literary and art policy in their practical creative work. 
					
					 He extended high appreciation and thanks to them for their successful performance.
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines for further developing the Juche-oriented acrobatic art. 
					
					 Underscoring the need to firmly establish Juche and properly combine socialist contents with national style in order to develop the socialist national acrobatics, he noted that it is the consistent policy of the WPK to do so.
					
					 It is necessary to direct primary efforts to the development of physical acrobatics including aerial trapeze and synchronized swimming and, at the same time, place comedic acrobatics and animal circus on a higher stage and positively develop jugglery pieces based on advanced science and technology.
					
					 It was one of the important factors of the steady development of the Juche-oriented acrobatics to have firmly established the system for training future acrobats, he said, calling for paying deep attention to training future acrobats. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that all the creators and artistes of the circus would create a lot of peculiar and successful pieces required by the era of the Workers' Party by devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm and thus educate the party members and other working people in a revolutionary manner to powerfully encourage them in the drive for accomplishing the cause of building a thriving nation.  
					
					 Among the audience were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Members of the NDC of the DPRK KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first deputy director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and KPA General U Tong Chuk and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, Thae Jong Su, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and its other leading officials and servicepersons and working people in the city.

articles.title: NDC States to Counter US-S. Korea War Exercises with Nuclear Deterrence
articles.content:
NDC States to Counter US-S. Korea War Exercises with Nuclear Deterrence
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces finally went into reckless actions against the DPRK after having frantically pushed ahead with the moves to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case. 
					 A spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission issued a statement on Saturday clarifying the principled stand of the army and people of the DPRK in this regard.
					
					 It said: The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are planning to stage joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea from July 25 to 28, the "Ulji Freedom Guardian" joint exercises and joint anti-submarine exercises in the West Sea of Korea from August 16 to 26 and different ceaseless joint naval exercises from late in August to early in September and other drills. All these war maneuvers are nothing but outright provocations aimed to stifle the DPRK by force of arms to all intents and purposes. 
					
					 If the publication of the results of investigation into the "Cheonan" case which was faked up by the U.S. imperialists at instigation of their puppet forces was the first reckless military provocation to the DPRK, the joint naval maneuvers they are to stage even with nuclear strike means involved under the pretext of the above-said case amount to an unpardonable second military provocation to the DPRK, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 The chief architect of the warship case seems to send a "message as deterrence" to somebody while staging offensive exercises under the pretext of the forged case after falsifying its truth. This is as reckless an act as waking up a sleeping tiger. 
					
					  The DPRK National Defence Commission re-clarifies the following principled stand as regards this abnormal situation where the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are threatening this land with a nuclear war under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case: 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will legitimately counter with their powerful nuclear deterrence the largest-ever nuclear war exercises to be staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. imperialists brandish their nukes and the more zealously their lackeys follow them, the more rapidly the DPRK's nuclear deterrence will be bolstered up along the orbit of self-defence and the more remote the prospect for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula will be become. 
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will start a retaliatory sacred war of their own style based on nuclear deterrent any time necessary in order to counter the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces deliberately pushing the situation to the brink of a war.  
					
					 Now that the U.S. imperialists are persisting in their direct military provocations in gross violation of the spirit of the September 19 joint statement in which they promised not to attack or invade the DPRK with either nuclear or conventional weapons, it is a natural option of the army and people of the DPRK to take corresponding all-out retaliatory measures.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will take all steps to the last to thoroughly probe the truth behind the case under the situation where the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces persistently and deliberately link the DPRK with the "Cheonan" case. 
					
					 It is a legitimate and sovereign right to protect the honor and dignity of the DPRK for them to probe the truth about the despicable "fabrication" and "charade." 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces will keenly realize what high price they will have to pay for their reckless military provocation rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case.

articles.title: FM Spokesman on DPRK Prepared for Dialogue and War
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on DPRK Prepared for Dialogue and War
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Saturday in connection with the fact that the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK have reached a more dangerous phase: 
					 At the recent U.S.-south Korea talks of "foreign and defense chiefs", the U.S. officially announced that it would stage large-scale war exercises against the DPRK and slap additional sanctions against it. 
					
					 The U.S. state secretary and defense secretary, touring the Demilitarized Zone along the Military Demarcation Line, made no scruple of letting loose anti-DPRK outbursts, fanning up war fever.
					
					 The U.S. has gone so fool as to try to browbeat the DPRK by brandishing a nuclear stick. This military provocation reminiscent of the "gunboat diplomacy" in the last century goes to prove that the U.S. has not yet discarded the Cold War way of thinking but has pursued confrontation, relying on outdated "military alliance".
					
					 The DPRK clarified internally and externally its will to settle the issue through the six-party talks on an equal footing, prompted by its desire to preserve peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The U.S., however, is driving the situation to an extreme phase after opting to escalate confrontation with the DPRK under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case with which the DPRK has nothing to do. The U.S. denied all dialogues including the DPRK-U.S. talks and the six-party talks, thus reneging on all its commitments before the international community and increasing its pressure upon the DPRK through war exercises and sanctions.
					
					 The U.S. provocations amount to trespassing on the off-limits fixed by the DPRK and it, therefore, feels no need to remain bounded to the off-limits drawn by the U.S. 
					
					 It is the mode of the DPRK's counteraction to react to sword brandishing in kind. The DPRK is prepared for both dialogue and war. It will remain unfazed by military threat and sanctions.
					
					 The present reality more clearly proves who is the arch criminal harassing peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster its nuclear deterrent in a more diversified manner and take strong physical measures as it had already clarified, now that the U.S. opted for military provocations, sanctions and pressure, defying the demand of the international community including the UN Security Council. The U.S. will be held wholly accountable for all ensuing consequences.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Projected Joint Military Maneuvers
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Projected Joint Military Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is set to kick off large-scale joint naval maneuvers together with the south Korean puppet forces at any cost from July 25, defying the protest and denunciation of the international community.
					 According to a plan announced at the U.S.-south Korea talks of "defense chiefs" on July 20, the projected exercises are air, sea and ground joint drills beyond imagination in terms of scale and style.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are contemplating staging the largest-ever joint military exercises in decades with at least 20 warships of various types including nuclear-powered carrier George Washington belonging to the U.S. 7th fleet and huge war hardware and troops including F-22 Raptor involved.
					
					 The U.S. had already started the largest-ever joint naval maneuvers with Japan and Australia in waters off Okinawa with task force flotilla with a nuclear carrier as a flag ship, missile cruisers, destroyers, submarines and a lot of aircraft involved.
					
					 The reckless military racket kicked up by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces is a dangerous military move to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The peninsula, a gateway to Northeast Asia, is a strategic vantage for realizing the U.S. Asia strategy for aggression. 
					
					 The U.S. which fabricated the "Cheonan" case considers it as a good opportunity for interfering in Northeast Asia by force of arms.
					
					 It wants to seize the projected military exercises as a golden chance for shuffling off the responsibility for the warship case upon the DPRK at any cost, defying international public opinion skeptical about the "results of investigation" into the case, and demonstrating its military presence and muscle.
					
					 Also lurking behind it is its attempt to contain big powers and put pressure upon them by force worldwide.
					
					 Through the above-said saber-rattling the U.S. seeks to "threaten" countries in the region and send a strong "warning message" to somebody.
					
					 The above-said war maneuvers are a blatant challenge to the human desire for peace as they are to be kicked off by the U.S. at a time when the international community is faced with an important political task to stabilize the situation on the Korean Peninsula and ensure lasting peace in the region.
					
					 There is no doubt that the enemies' escalated military stand-off with the DPRK would compel the latter to reinforce its retaliatory measures to safeguard the supreme interests of the country and the nation.
					
					 It is the steadfast mode of counteraction of the DPRK to return fire for fire. It never makes an empty talk.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces should immediately cancel the projected reckless nuclear war exercises, clearly facing up to the reality.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates 15th AU Summit
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates 15th AU Summit 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a congratulatory message to the 15th Summit of the African Union to be held in Uganda.
					 Extending, on behalf of the DPRK government, warm congratulations and greetings to all heads of state and government and representatives participating in the summit, Kim Yong Nam in the message said: 
					
					 The African Union is now making positive efforts to ensure peace and security of the region and realize its political, economic and military integration amidst the unanimous support and sympathy of the peoples of developing countries including the DPRK.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I send firm solidarity to the African people's just cause of building an independent and prosperous continent by their concerted efforts and reaffirm the invariable will of the DPRK government to more vigorously strengthen the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member states in all domains in the future, too.
					
					 I heartily hope that the AU summit, which will mark a significant occasion in taking practical measures for such regional peace and security and socio-economic development as promotion of maternal, infant and child health in Africa and further strengthening the AU, will produce good fruition in keeping with the common desire and interests of its member states.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Returns Home
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Returns Home
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and his party came back home Saturday after attending the Third World Conference of Speakers of Parliament.

articles.title: AFC "B" License Award Coaching Course Held
articles.content:
AFC "B" License Award Coaching Course Held
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- An AFC "B" license award coaching course was held in Pyongyang from July 6 to 23.
					 The course, divided into theoretical and practical subjects at Table-Tennis Gymnasium and Sosan Football Stadium in Chongchun Street, was participated in by coaches from various sports teams, teachers of Korea University of Physical Education and juvenile sports schools and other soccer experts. 
					
					 It dealt with the duty and role of coaches, playing system and tactics, health care, scoring skill and training of players, etc.
					
					?It was presided over by Ri Chun Man, an instructor of the AFC.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 89 Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 89 Off Press 
						
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 89, a library of the immortal Juche idea, which systematically and comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order.
					 It contains 42 works of President Kim Il Sung including his speeches, conclusions and talks between January and December in Juche 79 (1990).
					
					 The work "Let Us Bring the Advantages of Socialism in Our Country into Full Play" clarifies the essential nature, advantages and invincibility of socialism in the DPRK which embodied the Juche idea in all fields and indicates tasks and ways to push ahead with the drive to accomplish the cause of socialism.
					
					 Kim Il Sung in his work "The Fundamental Way of Achieving Victory in the Revolution Is to Strengthen the Party and Increase Its Leadership Role" gave perfect answers to the issues of further strengthening the WPK organizationally and ideologically by thoroughly adhering to the Juche-oriented principle of party-building and fully establishing the party's leadership over the revolution and construction.
					
					 The book contains works which set forth tasks and ways for increasing the might of the independent national economy by accelerating the socialist economic construction, laying a solid material and technical foundation and radically improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 In such works as "The Reunification of Our Country Should Be Achieved on the Three Principles of National Reunification" and "The Formation of Chongryon Is a Historic Event That Brought About a Radical Turn in the Development of the Movement of Koreans in Japan" the President indicated the orientation and ways to push ahead with the struggle for national reunification and the movement of overseas compatriots.
					
					 The book also contains works which give answers to the theoretical and practical matters arising in various fields including the issues of helping the honored disabled soldiers keep the flowers of the revolution in bloom and successfully training talented children.

articles.title: Taegyedo Tideland, Offspring of Korean People's Spiritual Power
articles.content:
Taegyedo Tideland, Offspring of Korean People's Spiritual Power
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Taegyedo tideland reclamation project has successfully been completed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with the approach of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and a conference of the WPK.
					 The project has changed the Korean map and brought about a great progress in the effort for the agricultural development and the improvement of the people's livelihood.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War President Kim Il Sung set forth a plan to reclaim tidelands on the west coast and organized powerful building forces for the projects.
					
					 True to his intention, General Secretary Kim Jong Il took measures to finish the Taegyedo Tideland reclamation at an early date and gave on-the-spot guidance to the project to encourage the builders to accelerate it.
					
					 The builders and helpers constructed dikes extending nearly 14 kilometers from Tasa Islet in Yomju County, North Phyongan Province to Cholsan Peninsula through Taedasa, Kacha and Taegye Islets and built a network of facilities in the reclaimed tideland in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude to obtain as large arable land as a county.
					
					 Through the project, they have demonstrated the indefinite spiritual power of the Korean people closely united around the WPK and their strong will to build a thriving nation without fail.
					
					 Several days ago, Kim Jong Il visited the reclaimed tideland and highly appreciated the builders' feats in finishing the huge nature-harnessing project.

articles.title: Dangerous "RIMPAC" Aimed at Second Korean War Censured
articles.content:
Dangerous RIMPAC Aimed at Second Korean War Censured 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The RIMPAC joint military maneuvers being staged by the U.S. in the Pacific with its satellite countries involved under the simulated conditions of "contingency" in Northeast Asia are a dangerous test operation aimed to provoke another Korean war and they are bringing the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					  RIMPAC is an adventurous multinational preliminary war mainly targeted against the DPRK in terms of its period, contents and nature and scale, to all intents and purposes, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. seeks to hurl its "allies" and followers into reckless collective armed invasion to stifle the DPRK by way of waging this preliminary war.
					
					 In recent years the U.S. has staged joint naval exercises, pursuant to PSI which it cooked up mainly for the purpose of conducting "maritime and air intercepting" aimed at the naval blockade against the DPRK. 
					
					 The main thrust of RIMPAC is to conduct operations for preemptive strikes from sea and air.
					
					 This proves that the purpose of the said war exercises is to round off the operations for preemptive naval and air attack on the DPRK.
					
					 What merits particular attention in RIMPAC is the fact that the U.S., south Korea and Japan have become brisk in their moves to knock into shape a triangular military alliance.
					
					 This indicates that the moves to cook up the above-said alliance to stifle the DPRK by force of arms by bringing together Japan, its junior ally, and the south Korean puppet authorities, its war servant, have reached a more dangerous phase.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are highly alerted over this very serious development. 
					
					 They love peace but will never show any leniency towards the aggressors. Should the enemies finally ignite a war against them, they will not miss the chance but settle accounts with the aggressors for all their crimes.

articles.title: Reshuffle at Chongwadae Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Reshuffle at "Chongwadae" Termed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea recently reshuffled the presidential secretary-general, the chief for policies and some other chief secretaries of "Chongwadae."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This was nothing but a third-rate charade to calm down the angry people's mindset and weather the deepening ruling crisis.
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea replaced a few goons of "Chongwadae," describing the measure as "a wholesale reshuffle going beyond a medium size" but this was no more than window-dressing.
					
					 No wonder, the south Korean opposition parties termed the above-said reshuffle at "Chongwadae" "revolving door-like reshuffle."
					
					 As a matter of fact, the recent reshuffle would bring no change in the treacherous policies of the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 The traitor staged the farce of replacing one yes-man with another, turning a deaf ear to the people's voices. 
					
					 What merits attention is that he left those looking after "diplomacy, security and unification" untouched. 
					
					 This goes to prove that in the latter half of his office, too, Lee Myung Bak is set to persistently pursue his pro-U.S. sycophantic, fascist and anti-reunification policies. 
					
					 The above-said reshuffle once again convinces the south Korean people that there is nothing to expect from the conservative group.

articles.title: Dangerous Confab to Tighten "Alliance" Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dangerous Confab to Tighten "Alliance" Assailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Members of different organizations and political parties of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress, the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society and the Democratic Labor Party held a joint press conference in Seoul on July 21 to condemn the United States and the puppet authorities for having held the "talks of diplomatic and defense chiefs".
					 Speakers there accused the diplomatic and military authorities of the U.S. and south Korea of opening the above-said talks for tightening their "alliance" that day. 
					
					 They held that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities would be closeted over the issues of ensuring reinforcements of the U.S. forces in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula, providing stable conditions for the U.S. troops' presence in south Korea and realizing their "strategic flexibility," etc. for the purpose of tightening the "alliance" for aggression and stepping up their hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 They also blasted the talks for contemplating the discussion on the issue of staging joint military exercises in waters for months to come under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case.
					
					 They urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stop at once such acts of turning deaf ear to the international call for the settlement of the issues on the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and by peaceful means. 
					
					 They also said that they should stop the discussion on the follow-up measures concerning the extension of "the transfer of wartime operational control", properly transfer the prerogative of military command over the army and immediately halt the dispatch of troops under the pretext of "alliance".

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Nigerian Organization 
Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a statement on July 14 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The UNSC in its recent presidential statement took heed of the stand of the DPRK that it had nothing to do with the case of the sunk warship "Cheonan", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This was a great diplomatic victory of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities' plot to make a mockery of the world public opinion through the U.N. forum went bust. 
					
					 The Korean people are the great people who shattered the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" and defended the freedom and independence of the country in the Korean War in the 1950s. 
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the DPRK in its efforts to smash the imperialists' moves to stifle it and defend its sovereignty and dignity. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately receive the inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the U.S. and south Korea should stop escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of President Kim Il Sung Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of President Kim Il Sung Commemorated 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Democratic Congo and a photo exhibition and a film show took place in Singapore from July 6 to 13 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					On display in their venues were photos showing the revolutionary career of the President and feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The president of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo, the chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea under the association and other speakers recalled that the President authored the theses on the socialist rural question and worked heart and soul for the settlement of the rural question in the DPRK and explained and proved the essence, validity and great vitality of the Juche idea. 
					
					 They underscored the need to apply successes and experience gained by the DPRK in solving the rural question and the Juche idea, the Songun idea to the actual conditions of Democratic Congo. 
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched a Korean film dealing with the brilliant revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great persons.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, vio la funcion conjunta del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang.
					  En la escena se pusieron las piezas acrobaticas con alta destreza artistica tales como la acrobacia corporal "Vuelo multilateral", la acuatica "Figuras corporales colectivas", la comica "Dos amigos", el circo de animales "El oso a la comba" y otras piezas galardonadas con el premio de oro en los festivales acrobaticos internacionales.
					
					  El Dirigente evaluo altamente el exito de la funcion y dio agradecimiento a los artistas del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang expresando gran satisfaccion de que ellos hayan materializado estrictamente en la creacion y la practica la orientacion del partido en materia de la literatura y el arte y ofrecido la excelente funcion que refleja el deseo y el firme impetu revolucionaria del pueblo coreano que logra incesantes saltos y avances.
					
					  Presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en desarrollar el arte acrobatico del Juche.
					
					  A fin de desarrollar la acrobacia nacional socialista es preciso establecer con firmeza el Juche y combinar correctamente el contenido socialista con la forma nacional, dijo y enfatizo que esto es la invariable orientacion del PTC.
					
					  Destaco que deben prestar primordial atencion a desarrollar la acrobacia corporal como la aerea y la acuatica y, al mismo tiempo, llevar a la etapa mas alta la acrobacia comica y la de animales y desarrollar activamente las piezas magicas apoyadas en las ciencias y tecnicas modernas.
					
					  Uno de los importantes factores que posibilitaron lograr el incesante desarrollo del circo autoctono de Corea reside en el firme establecimiento del sistema de la formacion de reservas de acrobatas, dijo y subrayo la necesidad de prestar profunda atencion a esta labor tambien en el futuro.
					
					  El Dirigente expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que todos los creadores y artistas del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang deben crear y representar muchas piezas especificas y  excelentes que demanda la epoca del Partido del Trabajo dedicando su inteligencia y entusiasmo para educar de manera revolucionaria a los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores y estimularlos energicamente a la lucha por la realizacion de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares; el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el general de ejercito del EPC U Tong Chuk quienes son miembros del CDN de la RPDC; y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y los organos de las fuerzas armadas; Jang Song Thaek, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC; Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Thae Jong Su, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, militares del EPC y trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: RPDC se enfrentara con el disuasivo nuclear a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
RPDC se enfrentara con el disuasivo nuclear a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos, que bajo el pretexto del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" han venido maniobrando freneticamente para aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, entraron por fin en las imprudentes acciones practicas contra esta, el portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 24 una declaracion que expone la posicion de principios del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					  Son abiertos actos provocativos para aplastar militarmente a la RPDC tanto el ejercicio conjunto maritimo que se realzara del 25 al 28 del mes en curso en el Mar Este de Corea, como el simulacro conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" que tendra lugar en el mismo mar del 16 al 26 de agosto, el entrenamiento conjunto antisubmarinos que se desarrollara en el Mar Oeste de Corea y otros ejercicios maritimos conjuntos que se efectuaran uno tras otro desde finales de agosto hasta principios de septiembre, senala la nota y continua:
					
					  Si la publicacion del resultado de investigacion del caso del buque de guerra "Cheonan" inventado por los imperialistas yanquis instigando a los titeres surcoreanos fue la primera provocacion militar temeraria contra la RPDC, tales ejercicios maritimos conjuntos, que tratan de efectuar so pretexto de dicho caso introduciendo hasta los medios de golpe nuclear, devienen la segunda provocacion militar intolerable contra la RPDC.
					
					  El autor del caso del hundimiento del "Cheonan" falsifico la verdad y desarrolla el ejercicio no "defensivo" sino ofensivo contra alguien tomandolo por pretexto y envia un "mensaje disuasorio", lo cual deviene un imprudente acto igual a irritar a un tigre que esta mudo.
					
					  En relacion con la anormal situacion en que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos acarrean el peligro de la guerra nuclear en este territorio so pretexto del caso del buque de guerra "Cheonan", el CDN de la RPDC vuelve a exponer al interior y exterior del pais la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea haran fidedignamente frente con el potente disuasivo nuclear a los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de mayor envergadura sin precedente en la historia que pretenden desarrollar los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					  Cuanto mas los imperialistas yanquis blanden las armas nucleares y los titeres surcoreanos le siguen ciegamente, tanto mas nuestro disuasivo nuclear se fortalecera a ritmo acelerado por su orbita de autodefensa y desaparecera mas y mas la esperanza en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea iniciaran en cualquier momento necesario la sagrada guerra de represalia al estilo coreano haciendo frente a que los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos llevan intencionalmente la situacion al borde de la guerra.
					
					  En las condiciones de que los yanquis recurren a las maniobras de provocacion militar directiva menospreciando totalmente el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre en que se comprometieron a no atacar ni invadir con las armas nucleares o convencionales la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea tienen la debida opcion de tomar las medidas de represalia total al respecto.
					
					  Puesto que ellos siguen relacionandonos persistentemente con el caso de la corbeta "Cheonan", tomaremos hasta el fin todas las medidas para aclarar la verdad del caso.
					
					  Poner al desnudo los verdaderos aspectos de la malsana "invencion" e "intriga" es el justo derecho independiente para defender el honor y la dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					  Los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos experimentaran profundamente cuan caro pagara su imprudente provocacion militar que lleva a la peor coyuntura la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana pretextando el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan".

articles.title: RPDC esta lista para el dialogo y la guerra, ratifica portavoz del MINREX
articles.content:
RPDC esta lista para el dialogo y la guerra, ratifica portavoz del MINREX
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que las maniobras de Estados Unidos encaminadas a aislar y aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea llegan a la etapa mas peligrosa, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 24 la siguiente respuesta a la pregunta de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea:
					En las recientes conversaciones entre los "ministros de Relaciones Exteriores y de Defensa Nacional" de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, el imperio publico oficialmente que realizara los ejercicios belicos de gran envergadura contra la RPDC y le ejercera la sancion adicional. Ademas, los secretarios de Estado y de Defensa de EE.UU. dieron vueltas por la zona desmilitarizada de la linea de demarcacion militar inculcando el clima de guerra y soltando sin escrupulos las palabras hostiles contra la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. actua absurdamente para atemorizar a la RPDC con el garrote nuclear. 
					
					Esta provocacion militar, que hace recordar la "diplomacia de canonero" del siglo pasado, muestra que EE.UU. no se libera todavia del modo de pensar de la epoca de la guerra fria, sino persigue solo la confrontacion recurriendo a la "alianza militar" tan vieja que ya ha de ser eliminada.
					
					Partiendo del anhelo de preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y de la region, hemos aclarado al interior y el exterior del pais la voluntad de solucionar el problema mediante las imparciales conversaciones a 6 bandas. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. opto el camino por la confrontacion so pretexto del incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" que no tiene nada que ver con la RPDC y lleva la situacion a la fase extrema. 
					
					Al negar todos los dialogos con la RPDC incluso las conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU. y la cita a 6 bandas, el imperio revoco sus compromisos hechos ante la sociedad internacional, desarrolla los ejercicios belicos e intensifica la presion mediante la sancion.
					
					Talas maniobras provocativas de EE.UU. pasan el limite fijado por la RPDC. Por lo tanto, esta no se ve obligada a atenerse al limite definido por EE.UU.
					
					Responder a la espada con la espada es la contramedida de la RPDC. 
					
					Estamos listos tanto para el dialogo como para la guerra. No nos sorprenderemos por la amenaza militar ni por la sancion.
					
					La situacion actual comprueba mas claramente quien es el perturbador de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y del Noreste Asiatico.
					
					Dado que EE.UU. se dirige a la provocacion militar, la sancion y el aplastamiento a la RPDC desoyendo la demanda del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y de la sociedad internacional, la RPDC fortalecera mas diversificadamente el disuasivo nuclear y respondera con las fuertes medidas fisicas, como ya habia expuesto. La consecuencia por el respecto recaera enteramente sobre EE.UU.

articles.title: ATCC condena ejercicio maritimo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ATCC condena ejercicio maritimo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ATCC) -- Pese a la protesta y condena de la sociedad internacional, Estados Unidos trata de efectuar a partir del dia 25, cueste lo que cueste, el ejercicio maritimo de gran envergadura junto con los titeres surcoreanos.
					  Segun el plan publicado en las conversaciones entre los "ministros de Defensa Nacional" de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, sostenidas el dia 20, el presente simulacro se realizara de modo tridimensional en el aire, el mar y la tierra sobrepasando la imaginacion tanto en su dimension como en su forma.
					
					  Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos planean movilizar en este simulacro de mayor dimension en los ultimos decenios mas de 20 buques de guerra incluido el portaaviones nuclear George Washington perteneciente a la Septima Flota norteamericana, los cazas F-22 Raptor que se jactan de la "supremacia mundial", y otros enormes equipos y fuerzas armadas.
					
					  EE.UU. desarrolla ya el ejercicio conjunto maritimo de mayor envergadura junto con Japon y Australia en torno a la isla Okinawa bajo la movilizacion del colectivo de golpe de buques de guerra encabezado por el portaaviones nuclear, cruceros de misiles, destructores, submarinos y muchos aviones.
					
					  Los imprudentes alborotos militares de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos devienen el peligroso movimiento militar para provocar por fin la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, puerta de la region del Nordeste Asiatico, que es el punto importante en la realizacion de la estrategia de agresion a Asia de EE.UU.
					
					  Este imperio invento el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" y lo toma por una oportunidad de la intervencion armada en esta region.
					
					  A traves de este simulacro militar, EE.UU. tiende a imputar a toda costa a la RPDC la responsabilidad del citado caso despreciando la opinion publica internacional que sospecha el "resultado de investigacion" y a convertirlo en la oportunidad para manifestar su existencia y poderio militares.
					
					  Tambien, en esta maniobra esta oculta la intencion de mantener a raya y presionar militarmente a las potencias en la esfera mundial.
					
					  El imperio pretende amenazar a los paises de la region y enviar un "mensaje de advertencia" fuerte a alguien.
					
					  Ahora, el problema de estabilizar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y preservar la paz duradera de esta region se presenta como importante tarea politica de la sociedad internacional.
					
					  Por lo tanto, las maniobras belicas de EE.UU. devienen el perverso desafio al deseo de la humanidad por la paz.
					
					  Cuanto mas los enemigos elevan el grado de enfrentamiento militar con la RPDC, tanto mas esta fortalecera el grado de contramedida para defender los intereses supremos del pais y la nacion.
					
					  Responder con el fuego al fuego es el firme modo de contramedida de la RPDC y esta no pronuncia palabras hueras.
					
					  Las fuerzas belicistas de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea deben ver correctamente la realidad y abandonar de inmediato sus imprudentes ejercicios de guerra nuclear.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicio militar conjunto "Rimpac"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicio militar conjunto "Rimpac"
						
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos libra en el Pacifico el ejercicio militar conjunto "Rimpac" movilizando los paises satelites bajo el rotulo de hacer frente al supuesto "tiempo de emergencia" en el Nordeste Asiatico.
					 Por esta peligrosa operacion militar de ensayo encaminada a desatar la segunda guerra coreana, en la Peninsula Coreana se cierne el nubarron de la guerra.
					
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					Al tomar en consideracion el tiempo, el contenido, el caracter y la dimension, el ejercicio "Rimpac" es una aventurera guerra previa multinacional que tiene por su blanco principal a la RPDC.
					
					A traves de esta guerra de ensayo, EE.UU. pretende lanzar a los "paises aliados" y otras fuerzas entreguistas a la agresion armada colectiva para atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					En los ultimos anos el imperio invento la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (ISP) cuyo objetivo es ejercer el bloqueo maritimo sobre la RPDC mediante la "inspeccion sobre el mar y el cielo" y desarrolla los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos en el marco de la ISP.
					
					Lo principal del simulacro "Rimpac" es la operacion de ataque preventivo en el mar y en el cielo.
					
					Esto comprueba que dicho ejercicio tiene por su objetivo perfeccionar la operacion de ataque preventivo maritimo y aereo contra la RPDC.
					
					Lo mas cuestionable del presente simulacro es que se activa el movimiento por el fortalecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita entre EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea para atropellar militarmente a la RPDC. 
					
					Por lo tanto, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea estan en alta vigilancia ante esta situacion tan critica. 
					
					Si los enemigos desatan por fin la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, que aman la paz y no benefician nunca a los agresores, no perderan la oportunidad para saldar cuenta final con los invasores.
